channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: College financial aid can look more generous than it is. Use this checklist to find out what you’re really getting.
item.description: Make sure to fully understand a college award letter before signing it.

item.title: Retiring abroad is touted as a money saver — but it isn’t always cheaper
item.description: Taxes, investments, healthcare — everything adds up. Here’s how to plan now to relocate later.

item.title: Hotel stays now can easily cost $100 extra, thanks to local ‘bed taxes’
item.description: Some locales, like Kyoto and San Diego, are increasing the taxes they levy on visitors.

item.title: Social Security is hurtling towards insolvency. Could these new proposals help save it in time?
item.description: Ideas for reform churn up opposition from advocacy groups.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
